definition: at or toward the front of the stage, of the front half of a stage, the front half of the stage, as seen from the audience
details:
adverb
- at or toward the front of the stage
= example: at or toward the front of the stage
adjective
- of the front half of a stage
noun
- the front half of the stage, as seen from the audience
= example: the front half of the stage, as seen from the audience
